description:
Designer & management software for xTool laser cutters & engravers.


1. New xTool Academy: The homepage now includes the "xTool Academy," where users can quickly access design and processing knowledge.
2. New In-App Feedback: When encountering software issues or suggestions, users can directly submit feedback or report problems via the account menu > Feedback.
3. Editor Experience Optimization:
- The top design bar has been reorganized to provide more space for displaying important information and tools.
- The font library now includes a "Single-line Fonts" collection, providing more design options.
- The text now defaults to the last used font, weight, and size, simplifying the font setting process.
- The row and column limits for square arrays have been increased, enabling the creation of larger arrays and improving design efficiency.
- Mouse middle-click drag support for canvas.
4. New Regular Hexagon Puzzle: Supports selecting puzzle direction blocks and adds puzzle border functionality.
5. Material Grid Test Optimization: Supports automatic array generation, simplifying the operation process.
6. Supports Custom Path Settings in Rotating Fixture Mode: Improves processing efficiency in specific scenarios.
7. Supports Over-Cutting Settings: Solves the problem of the starting and ending points not cutting through, ensuring more complete processing results. (Only supports non-F series devices.)
8. Supports Step-by-Step Focus Sink: Significantly improves cutting capability by gradually sinking the focus, resulting in better cutting effects. (Supported devices: P2 / P2S / P3 / S1 / F1U / F2 / F2U / F2U UV)
9. New Lead-in Feature for P3: P3 now supports the lead-in feature, solving the blackening issue at the starting point and improving processing precision and efficiency.
10. Apparel Printer:
- Supports 600mm long material printing (requires 023 firmware).
- Optimized white ink reduction function, supporting the setting of non-reduced areas through the spot color channel.
- Added 5 self-service troubleshooting functions to help users quickly resolve common issues and avoid work interruptions.
11. Bug Fixed:
- Solved the issue of poor processing precision at low line density (F series only).
- Fixed the issue of coordinate origin changes and abnormal size display after object rotation.
- Fixed the issue of occasional font not applying when clicked.
- Fixed other known issues.
